/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a large white cloud visible in the distance, adding depth to the image. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban surroundings. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in this part of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
